name: milanbargiel.com
description: Personal website of developer and designer Milan Bargiel
author: Milan Bargiel

scriptsComments.lint-scss: lint scss-files with rules specified in .stylelintrc.json
scriptsComments.postcss: use postcss to autoprefix css-files in dist-folder without sourcemap in output
scriptsComments.copyfiles: copy files from assets folder to /dist
scriptsComments.build:html: render templates with partials (filename starts with underscore) to dist folder
scriptsComments.build:images: optimize images and output in dist folder
scriptsComments.build:javascript: copy all javascript files to dist folder, without copying folder structure
scriptsComments.serve: start a local dev server and reload browser on filechange in dist folder
scriptsComments.start: run build and watch tasks in parallel
